sourcesContent: import { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import Prism from 'prismjs' import { Row, Col, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import ModalBasic from './ModalBasic' import ModalThemes from './ModalThemes' import ModalSizes from './ModalSizes' import ModalEvents from './ModalEvents' import ModalFormAndScroll from './ModalFormAndScroll' import ModalUnmount from './ModalUnmount' import BreadCrumbs from '@Components/breadcrumbs' import Card from '@Components/card-snippet' import { modalBasic, modalTheme, modalSizes, modalEvents, modalForm, modalUnmount } from './ModalSourceCode' const Modals = () => { useEffect(() => { Prism.highlightAll() }, []) return ( Use Modal, ModalBody and ModalFooter tags to create a Modal with reactstrap. Use class .modal-[color] with your .modal to change theme of modal Use class .modal-[xs/sm/lg/xl] with ModalHeader to change modal Size. Use props onClosed / onOpened for modal events. Write something (data should remain in modal if unmountOnClose is set to false). ) } export default Modals
